channel.title: Special Bar Lags When Clicked
channel.description:
Hi guys.
I have a problem with my server/client, which I really need help with.
Whenever I click my special bar to use a spec, the special bar lags and therefor the special attack only happens a bit after I clicked my special bar.
Please help, I would really appreciate it!
Thanks in advance. - Jackson.

item.title: Special Bar Lags When Clicked
